#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<set>
#include<string>
#include<cmath>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
main()
{
	int t,n,x;
	char str[5];
	cin>>str;
	int sum=0;
	while(str[0]!='#')
	{
		sscanf(str,"%d",&n);
		sum=0;
		for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
		{
			if(i<=3)
			{
				sum+=i*i;
			}
			else
			{
				x=i%10;
				sum+=(x*x*x*x)%10;
			}
		}
		cout<<sum%10<<"\n";
		cin>>str;	
	}
}
